Author: JohnNaguib
Title: Top 10 Azure Services Everyone Should Know (2025 Edition)
EnhancedContent:
In today’s rapidly evolving cloud landscape, knowing your way around key cloud-platform services is no longer optional. If you’re working in IT, development, or business strategy, understanding the essential services on Microsoft Azure gives you a competitive edge. Azure supports everything from virtual machines to serverless functions to globally distributed databases. According to Microsoft, Azure offers “Compute, Storage, Networking, Databases, AI + Machine Learning” and many more categories. Here are the top 10 Azure services everyone should know in 2025—what they are, why they matter, and when to use them

[https://dellenny.com/top-10-azure-services-everyone-should-know-2025-edition/](https://dellenny.com/top-10-azure-services-everyone-should-know-2025-edition/)
